column9: It offers additional security by attaching at the top of the mattress instead of adjacent to the mattress like traditional style bed rails.
column10: It offers additional security by attaching at the top of the mattress instead of adjacent to the mattress like traditional style bed rails. A colour coded safety position indicator lets the parent know when properly positioned and locked. Eliminates possible entrapment between bed and bed rail. The bed rail meets ASTM bed rail standards and cannot be used in place of a crib or on a bunk bed or a bed with inflatable mattress.

column9: The Summit ISO AP is our most innovative convertible car seat, that grows with your child. column9: The Visto 4-Wheel Stroller is our vote for a feature packed, stylish stroller. The ultimate newborn travel stroller, the Visto is lightweight and features a compact fold, perfect for smaller vehicles. Other features include a fully reclinable seat for a newborn, height adjustable handle bar, lockable front wheels, linked one-foot brake, an extendable sun canopy with breathable mesh insert and viewing window. Parents will love the extra large shopping basket, and reversible seat liner, that allows you to change your Visto, depending on your mood.The Visto 4 is compatible with Maxi Cosi capsules (adaptors sold separately) and can be used from birth to approximately 4 years (17kg).
